sen.j: 安勅内親王（あてないしんのう、生年不詳 - 斉衡2年9月17日 (旧暦)（855年10月31日））は、平安時代初期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Ate (birth year unknown-October 31, 855) was a member of the imperial family in the early Heian period.
Imperial Princess Ate (birth year unknown-October 31, 855) was a member of the imperial family during the early Heian period.
Imperial Princess Ate (year of birth unknown - November 4, 855) was a member of the Imperial Family during the early Heian period.

sen.j: 桓武天皇の第13皇女で、母は宮人の従四位下藤原河子（神祇伯藤原大継女）。
sen.e: She was the thirteenth princess of Emperor Kanmu, and her mother was Kyujin (court lady), Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade), FUJIWARA no Kawako (daughter of Jingi haku (a chief official in charge of matters relating to Shintoism), FUJIWARA no Otsugu).

She was the thirteenth princess of Emperor Kanmu, and her mother was Kyujin (court lady), Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade), FUJIWARA no Kawako (daughter of Jingi haku - a chief official in charge of matters relating to Shintoism), FUJIWARA no Otsugu).

She was the thirteenth princess of Emperor Kanmu, and her mother was Kyujin (court lady), Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade), FUJIWARA no Kawako (daughter of Jingi haku - a chief official in charge of matters relating to Shintoism), FUJIWARA no Otsugu).

sen.j: 平城天皇・嵯峨天皇・淳和天皇らの異母姉妹で、同母兄弟に仲野親王・大井内親王・紀内親王・善原内親王がいた。
sen.e: She was a sister to Emperor Heijo, Emperor Saga, Emperor Junna with a different mother, and Imperial Prince Nakano, Imperial Princess Oi, Imperial Princess Ki, Imperial Princess Yoshihara were her siblings with different mothers.

She was a sister to Emperor Heijo, Emperor Saga, Emperor Junna, by a different mother, and Imperial Prince Nakano, Imperial Princess Oi, Imperial Princess Ki, Imperial Princess Yoshihara were her siblings by different mothers.

She was a sister to Emperor Heizei, Emperor Saga, Emperor Junna, by a different mother, and Imperial Prince Nakano, Imperial Princess Oi, Imperial Princess Ki, Imperial Princess Yoshihara were her siblings by different mothers.

sen.j: 母藤原河子は藤原京家の出身。
sen.e: Her mother, FUJIWARA no Kawako was from the Western House of the Fujiwara clan.
Her mother, FUJIWARA no Kawako was from the Western House of the Fujiwara clan.
Her mother, FUJIWARA no Kawako was from the Western House of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 弘仁8年（817年）四品に叙品され、嘉祥2年（849年）に出家した。
sen.e: She was appointed to shihon (the fourth rank of Imperial Princes' rank), and became a priest in 849.
She was appointed to shihon (the fourth rank for an Imperial Princess), and became a priest in 849.
She was appointed to shihon (the fourth rank for an Imperial Princess) in 817, and became a priest in 849.

sen.j: 文徳天皇（嵯峨天皇の孫）の治世下の斉衡2年（855年）9月17日に薨去。
sen.e: She passed away on September 17, 855, in the reign of Emperor Montoku (grandchild of Emperor Saga).
She passed away on September 17, 855, during the reign of Emperor Montoku (grandchild of Emperor Saga).
She passed away on November 4, 855, during the reign of Emperor Montoku (grandchild of Emperor Saga).
